dynamic_line: **You hear nothing.  The screen says that the only available satellites are near the horizon.  Your connection is limited.*

Katherine McAster:
<u_name>?  Is that really you?!

Katherine McAster:
Oh my god!  I thought I'd never hear from you again.

responses.text: Katherine, I don't know where to start!  It's so much worse than anyone expected.  The dead are… alive!  The cops, the military… there's no one in control.  You have to get me outta here!

dynamic_line:
Katherine McAster:
I…  Listen…  Fuck it, there's no other way to say it.  It's not just the New England area; it's everywhere!  It's so much worse than anyone thought.  We dropped you off, went out to film for the night, and then went back to the studio.  When we got back, Peter was there.  He had become one of… them.  I didn't know what to do, so we just left.  I can log the footage on my laptop, but there's nowhere to send it to.  We're staying on the coast now, but I… I'm not sure we can get to you.

responses.text: What do you mean?  How many of you are there?

dynamic_line:
Katherine McAster:
There's three of us: me, Jimmy, and the intern.  We're safe, far away from the cities, at least for now.  But, there's no way we can leave.  It's too dangerous to use the roads, <u_name>.  I've seen things out there that look like they wandered out of a movie.  We tried to flag down a Coast Guard ship a few days ago, but it just… drifted right past us.

Katherine McAster:
I…  Well…

**Katherine seems to put the phone down for a second.  There's muted talking in the background.*

Katherine McAster:
If you can get to the coast in one piece, I'll find a boat and come pick you up.  A row boat, if we have to.

Katherine McAster:
I'm sorry we did this.  I know how much you wanted it, but I still should have said no.

responses.text: Just get me out of here, I'm begging you.

dynamic_line:
Katherine McAster:
Okay, listen, make it to the coast and I'll come get you.  I promise.  Head east and we'll be there.

Katherine McAster:
When you get to the coast, send up a signal.  A flare, a fire, anything.  I can't guarantee we'll have a connection, but I'll see that.

Katherine McAster:
Until I see you, stay safe.  Oh, and <u_name>, if you're there anyway, try to get some good shots.
